column1: Swertings is a name referring to the Haradrim. The word was Hobbitish
column2: used among the Hobbits of the secluded the Shire. Only legends about them reached the Hobbits: the Swertings lived in the Sunlands and rode to war on oliphaunts.

column1: Swerting is a word related to the term Swarthy Men used in the Westron (where swarthy is an old word for dark-skinned).
Wikipedia:Swerting is an Old English name
